key.name: org.jfree.report.ConfigStore
key.description: Selects which implementation is responsible for storing configuration information.

key.name: org.jfree.report.LogLevel
key.description: The minimum loglevel that is logged.

key.name: org.jfree.report.LogTarget
key.description: Selects which implementation is responsible for logging.

key.name: org.jfree.report.NoDefaultDebug
key.description: Defines, whether the debugging system should be disabled by default. This option will surpress all output, no single line of debug information will be printed. If you want to remove System.out-debugging on the server side, try to switch to a Log4J-LogTarget instead.

key.name: org.jfree.report.PrintOperationComment
key.description: Defines, whether the page layouter prints a massive amount of debug messages. This is for debugging only, you wouldn't activate this in a production system.

key.name: org.jfree.report.StrictErrorHandling
key.description: Defines a stricter error handling, if set to true, then all errors that occur during the report processing will cause the report processing to fail. It is safe to set this to true, as valid reports never throw exceptions.

key.name: org.jfree.report.WarnInvalidColumns
key.description: Should the datarow print warning on invalid columns? Invalid column requests always return null. If set to true, an additional logging entry is added.

key.name: org.jfree.report.ext.modules.barcode.base.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.ext.modules.barcode.io.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.ext.modules.java14config.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.ext.modules.java14log.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.ext.modules.java14print.Enable
key.description: Defines, whether to enable the Java.1.4 style printing plugin. At the moment, this only usses the default dialogs, and you should not see any difference to the AWT engine.

key.name: org.jfree.report.ext.modules.java14print.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.ext.modules.java14print.Order
key.description: Defines the export plugin order in the preview dialogs.

key.name: org.jfree.report.ext.modules.jfreechart.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.ext.modules.log4jlog.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.layout.fontrenderer.IsBuggyFRC
key.description: This is a override setting. Some Graphics2D implementations have problems with the font positioning. I don't know a way to resolve that bug, try setting this property to "true" to resolve wrong/buggy string draw results.

key.name: org.jfree.report.layout.fontrenderer.UseAliasing
key.description: Enable aliasing for Graphics2D. This may result is textlayout errors on some systems. If your text is not correctly aligned, disable this property.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.base.EncodingsAvailable
key.description:
The property that defines which encodings are available in the export dialogs. This property defaults to "all" and can be set to either "all", "none" or "file".
If the property is set to "file", then the list of available properties is read from the file defined in the property "org.jfree.report.encodings.file".

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.base.EncodingsFile
key.description:
Defines the name of the properties file used to define the available encodings.
The property points to a resources in the classpath, not to a real file!

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.base.LargeIcons
key.description: Defines, whether the toolbar will contain large icons. This is enabled by default.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.base.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.base.SwingDialogTranslation
key.description: Defines, whether we should translate the standard swing dialogs.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.base.ToolbarFloatable
key.description: Defines, whether the toolbar will be floatable. This is not enabled by default.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.config.EditorFont
key.description: The font used to display monospaced text in the text areas

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.config.EditorFontSize
key.description: The font size used to display monospaced text.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.config.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.converter.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.csv.Enable
key.description: Set to false to disable the CSV export using the preview dialog. This will not prevent anyone from calling the dialog's methods manually, but the export plugin will not be visible by default.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.csv.Encoding
key.description:
Selected default encoding for the csv export dialog. This properties does not affect the CSV export directly, it is used to configure the used writer when writing.
If not defined here, it will default to the platform specific encoding.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.csv.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.csv.Order
key.description: Defines the export plugin order in the preview dialogs.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.html.Enable
key.description: Set to false to disable the Html export using the preview dialog. This will not prevent anyone from calling the dialog's methods manually, but the export plugin will not be visible by default.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.html.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.html.Order
key.description: Defines the export plugin order in the preview dialogs.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.pdf.Enable
key.description: Set to false to disable the PDF export using the preview dialog. This will not prevent anyone from calling the dialog's methods manually, but the export plugin will not be visible by default.

key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.description: Set to false to disable the PlainText export using the preview dialog. This will not prevent anyone from calling the dialog's methods manually, but the export plugin will not be visible by default.

key.description: Defines the export plugin order in the preview dialogs.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.print.Enable
key.description: Set to false to disable the PlainText export using the preview dialog. This will not prevent anyone from calling the dialog's methods manually, but the export plugin will not be visible by default.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.print.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.print.Order
key.description: Defines the export plugin order in the preview dialogs.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.print.pagesetup.Enable
key.description: Set to false to disable the PageSetup dialog using the preview dialog. This will not prevent anyone from calling the dialog's methods manually, but the export plugin will not be visible by default.

key.description: Defines the export plugin order in the preview dialogs.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.xls.Enable
key.description: Set to false to disable the Excel export using the preview dialog. This will not prevent anyone from calling the dialog's methods manually, but the export plugin will not be visible by default.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.xls.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.gui.xls.Order
key.description: Defines the export plugin order in the preview dialogs.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.misc.beanshell.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.misc.configstore.base.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.misc.configstore.filesystem.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.misc.configstore.filesystem.SystemTargetDir
key.description: Defines the directory, where the system settings will be stored. If the directory starts with an '~/', the given directory will be considered relative to the users home directory.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.misc.configstore.filesystem.UserTargetDir
key.description: Defines the directory, where the user settings will be stored. If the directory starts with an '~/', the given directory will be considered relative to the users home directory.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.misc.logging.base.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.misc.referencedoc.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.misc.tablemodel.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.misc.tablemodel.TableFactoryMode
key.description: The tablemodel factory mode for the ResultSetTableModelFactory if set to "simple" the factory will always return a DefaultTableModel.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.csv.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.csv.Separator
key.description: Defines the column separator, defaults to comma.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.csv.WriteDatarowNames
key.description: Defines whether to write the column names of the datarow into the first row.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.pageable.base.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.pageable.graphics.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.pageable.pdf.AllowAssembly
key.description: Defines, whether the PDF Security setting allows reassmebly of the document by default.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.pageable.pdf.AllowCopy
key.description: Defines, whether the PDF Security setting allows copying of the document's contents by default.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.pageable.pdf.AllowDegradedPrinting
key.description: Defines, whether the PDF Security setting allows low quality printing of the document's contents by default.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.pageable.pdf.AllowFillIn
key.description: Defines, whether the PDF Security setting allows the fill-in of document forms (inputfields etc).

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.pageable.pdf.AllowModifyAnnotations
key.description: Defines, whether the PDF Security setting allows document annotations by default.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.pageable.pdf.AllowModifyContents
key.description: Defines, whether the PDF Security setting allows modifying of the document by default.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.pageable.pdf.AllowPrinting
key.description: Defines, whether the PDF Security setting allows printing of the document's contents by default.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.pageable.pdf.AllowScreenReaders
key.description: Defines, whether the PDF Security setting allows access for screenreaders by default. Although this could make it easier to grab the contents your PDF document, enabling this property will allow blind people to access your content. It is usually a good idea to always enable this property.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.pageable.pdf.Author
key.description: The author string of the document.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.pageable.pdf.EmbedFonts
key.description: Defines whether to embed fonts in the generated PDF. This will result in larger PDF files, but makes sure that all characters are displayed properly.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.pageable.pdf.Encoding
key.description:
The default font-encoding for the OutputTarget. Can be changed with PDFOutputTarget.setFontEncoding for the specific instance if needed.
The encoding can also be defined on a per-element level.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.pageable.pdf.Encryption
key.description:
Defines whether the PDF file should be encrypted by default. Set this to "none" "40bit" or "128bit".
Access restrictions have no effect if the document is not encrypted, and not all security settings are active on 40-Bit encryption.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.pageable.pdf.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.pageable.pdf.OwnerPassword
key.description:
Defines the OwnerPassword for the PDF document. The owner has all perfmissions on the document and will be able to change the security settings.
Warning: Specifying passwords in the property file can introduce a security risk. Do not use these settings on the client side or in unprotected (world-readable) server environments. In these cases use other means of defining the password.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.pageable.pdf.Title
key.description: The title of the document.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.pageable.pdf.UserPassword
key.description:
The default user password for the document. Users are able to access the document within the defined security restrictions.
Warning: Specifying passwords in the property file can introduce a security risk. Do not use these settings on the client side or in unprotected (world-readable) server environments. In these cases use other means of defining the password.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.pageable.plaintext.CharsPerInch
key.description: Defines the printer font. Valid values are 10, 12, 15, 17 or 20

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.pageable.plaintext.Encoding
key.description: This property defaults to the current platform encoding, but should be adjusted when using one of the printer specifc command sets, as these command sets don't support all encodings.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.pageable.plaintext.LinesPerInch
key.description: Defines the printer font. Valid values are 6 or 10

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.pageable.plaintext.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.support.itext.AutoInit
key.description:
Defines, whether and how to register the fonts installed on that system. This will search the installed fonts on well-known locations based on the detected system environment.
Lazy font registration will defer the registration process until the font factory is first used. If the registration is defined to happen on init, the fonts will be registered as soon as the module get active for the first time.
The automatic registration can be disabled by setting this configuration entry to "never". You will have to register the fonts manually before you start the output, or TrueType fonts will not be available.
Valid values are "onInit", "never" or "lazy".

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.support.itext.Encoding
key.description: Defines the encoding to be used during the font initialisation. If not defined, then the plattform default encoding will be used.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.support.itext.GCAfterRegister
key.description: Defines, whether to run the garbage collector after the fonts have been registered.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.support.itext.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.table.base.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.table.base.StrictLayout
key.description: Defines whether a stricter, but more accurate layout algorithm should be applied. Setting this property to false will greatly reduce the table complexity.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.table.csv.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.table.csv.Separator
key.description: Defines the default separator, that should be used for the output.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.table.html.Author
key.description: Defines a author for generated HTML documents.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.table.html.BodyFragment
key.description: Defines whether to define a body fragment only. This removes the header and body tags and makes it easy to include the generated content in own pages.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.table.html.Encoding
key.description: Defines the document encoding. If undefined, it defaults to the platforms default encoding.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.table.html.GenerateXHTML
key.description: Defines whether to generate XHTML1.0 or HTML4.0 content.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.table.html.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.table.html.Title
key.description: Defines the default title for generated HTML documents.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.table.rtf.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.table.xls.EnhancedDataFormat
key.description: Whether to apply the Cell-DataFormat strings to excel cells. If disabled, all content is inserted as text. This way you won't be able to perform calculations on the generated content, but it is more safe in case of invalid cell formats.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.table.xls.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.table.xls.Paper
key.description: Defines the Paper that should be used in the excel print setup. If no paper is defined, an suitable paper will be selected automaticly.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.table.xls.PaperOrientation
key.description: Defines the Paper that should be used in the excel print setup. If no paper is defined, an suitable paper will be selected automaticly. Valid values are "Landscape" or "Portrait"

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.output.xml.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.parser.base.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.parser.base.Validate
key.description: Defines, whether the parser should try to validate against a possibly given DTD.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.parser.ext.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.parser.extwriter.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.jfree.report.modules.parser.simple.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.
